imdb.title: The Reflection
imdb.plot: Three years prior to the shows current events. A calamity occurred known as, The Reflection. Resulting in a portion of the earth's population, to acquire special abilities. Some of these chosen people decided to take on the life o...

episodes.title: Ceremony
episodes.plot: The Reflection: a mysterious worldwide phenomenon that robbed many of their lives. Three years later, people gather at the memorial ceremony in New York, but some of the survivors from the Reflection appear and commit a terrorist attack.

episodes.title: Survivor
episodes.plot: What is the connection between the flying hero I-Guy and the world-changing event called the Reflection? Will more heroes emerge, or will more Reflected choose to become criminals? Will society give them a choice?

episodes.title: Lisa
episodes.plot: Eleanor gets asked by X-On to investigate an unidentified being called Wraith. While investigating Wraith, she finds out that two women with the last name Allen have disappeared, and Eleanor and X-On head to Dayton, Ohio to investigate further.

episodes.title: New Orleans
episodes.plot: With news of I-Guy being reported on a daily basis in LA, Ian is that his alter ego is getting all of the attention. Meanwhile, Lisa joins X-On and Eleanor on their trip.

episodes.title: Vy and Michael
episodes.plot: Eleanor is captured by the Reflected duo named Merchant and Trader. Lisa and X-On search for Eleanor in New Orleans, but city seems to want to get rid of any Reflected.

episodes.title: San Antonio
episodes.plot: Eleanor and the others head to San Antonio to try to save some of the Allen family, but Wraith's followers beat them to the punch. All hope seems lost until they discover a woman named Nina.

episodes.title: Team I-Guy
episodes.plot: Eleanor and the others fail to rescue Nina. X-On tells I-Guy that he has a problem with his selfish fighting style, and the two butt heads.

episodes.title: Beef or Fish
episodes.plot: Steel Ruler offers a deal to Eleanor, telling her that if she accepts Wraith's invitation to join them, they will release the Reflected that they abducted in New Orleans.

episodes.title: Downtown LA
episodes.plot: Eleanor goes along with Steel Ruler in order to save the thirty kidnapped Reflected, and Debra follows her in a van. However, Steel Ruler and Wraith's other subordinates use their abilities to get away.

episodes.title: Eleanor
episodes.plot: X-On and the others arrive at a mansion in the LA suburbs in their pursuit of Eleanor. However, it's a trap. While in battle, X-On sees Eleanor and chases after her.

episodes.title: White Sands
episodes.plot: Wraith's true identity is revealed to X-On. After learning that shocking truth, everyone in the mansion is transported to White Sands. They soon find out that many other Reflected were transported there as well.

episodes.title: The Reflection
episodes.plot: The Reflected have been gathered to White Sands. Wraith absorbs their dark energy and puts his plan into motion. Darkness covers the world and something appears. Will X-On and the others be able to stop Wraith?
